law.catch_line: At least 20 days before the special primary election, the State Board shall certify to the appropria...

text.section: At least 20 days before the special primary election, the State Board shall certify to the appropriate local boards the name, residence, and party affiliation of each candidate who qualifies to appear on the primary election ballot.

At least 20 days before the special general election, the State Board shall certify to the appropriate local boards the name, residence, and party affiliation of each nominee who qualifies to appear on the general election ballot.
